name: Traveling. Plant. Killers (NOT finished)
description:
TPK or Traveling Plant Killers is a game about traveling heroes that go from city to city purging each one of zombie population. You and your friends command plant units to face off against hordes of zombies. 

T.P.K can be played solo, with a GM, or with no GM and a bunch of friends. It is currently NOT at all close to complete, but hopefully coming soon!

Thank you to TPKRoleplay and their community for hosting the game jam and helping with inspiration.
